UI_visible_response: It was produced by Chai Jing. The work focuses on the issue of air pollution in China. Through in - depth investigations, data analysis, and on - the - spot interviews, it presents the current situation, causes, and impacts of air pollution, aiming to raise public awareness of environmental protection and promote discussions and actions on addressing air pollution problems.
traffic_visible_response: "Under the Dome" is a documentary - style investigative work.It was produced by Chai Jing. The work focuses on the issue of air pollution in China. Through in - depth investigations, data analysis, and on - the - spot interviews, it presents the current situation, causes, and impacts of air pollution, aiming to raise public awareness of environmental protection and promote discussions and actions on addressing air pollution problems.
